trans-unit.source: Represents a Workflow role that is backed by a <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider" />.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta un ruolo del flusso di lavoro supportato da un <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider" />.

trans-unit.source: For more information about roles in ASP.NET, see [Role Providers](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=96709).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sui ruoli in ASP.NET, vedere [i provider di ruoli](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=96709).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole" />.

trans-unit.source: A string that defines the name of the role.
trans-unit.target: Stringa che definisce il nome del ruolo.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole" /> class by using the specified role name.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole" /> tramite il nome di ruolo specificato.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="roleName" /> contains a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="roleName" /> contiene un riferimento null (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: A string that defines the name of the role.
trans-unit.target: Stringa che definisce il nome del ruolo.

trans-unit.source: A string that defines the role provider.
trans-unit.target: Stringa che definisce il provider di ruoli.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole" /> class by using the specified role name and role provider.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole" /> utilizzando il nome di ruolo e il provider di ruoli specificati.

trans-unit.source: The most commonly used role providers for <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole> are classes that inherit from <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider>.
trans-unit.target: I provider di ruoli pi√π comunemente usati per <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole> sono classi che ereditano da <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider>.

trans-unit.source: These classes include <xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider>, <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider> and <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider>.
trans-unit.target: Tali classi includono <xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider>, <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider> e <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="roleName" /> contains a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="roleName" /> contiene un riferimento null (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Returns a generic list of ASP.NET accounts associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole" />.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un elenco generico di account ASP.NET associati a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole" />.

trans-unit.source: A generic list of string values that represent the ASP.NET accounts associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole" />.
trans-unit.target: Un elenco generico di valori stringa che rappresentano gli account ASP.NET associa a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider> supports only <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.IsUserInRole%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.GetRolesForUser%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider> supporta solo <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.IsUserInRole%2A> e <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.GetRolesForUser%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Furthermore, it supports these methods only for the user account that is currently the WindowsPrincipal associated with the request context, so you cannot call <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.GetRolesForUser%2A> for any user account in the domain.
trans-unit.target: Questi metodi sono inoltre supportati solo per l'account utente che √® attualmente l'oggetto WindowsPrincipal associato al contesto della richiesta, pertanto non √® possibile chiamare il metodo <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.GetRolesForUser%2A> per qualsiasi account utente nel dominio.

trans-unit.source: When using the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole.GetIdentities%2A> method with the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider>, the following provider exception is thrown:
trans-unit.target: Quando viene utilizzato il metodo <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole.GetIdentities%2A> con <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider>, viene generata la seguente eccezione del provider:

trans-unit.source: The configured Role Provider (WindowsTokenRoleProvider) relies upon Windows authentication to determine the groups that the user is allowed to be a member of.
trans-unit.target: Il provider di ruoli configurato (WindowsTokenRoleProvider) si basa sull'autenticazione di Windows per determinare i gruppi dei quali l'utente pu√≤ essere membro.

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET Role Manager cannot be used to manage Windows users and groups.
trans-unit.target: Non √® possibile utilizzare Gestione ruoli di ASP.NET per gestire utenti e gruppi di Windows.

trans-unit.source: Use the SQLRoleProvider if you want to support custom user/role assignment.
trans-unit.target: Per supportare l'assegnazione di utente/ruoli personalizzati utilizzare SQLRoleProvider.

trans-unit.source: The name of the identity to test for.
trans-unit.target: Nome dell'identit√† per il test.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole" /> contains the specified identity
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un valore che indica se <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole" /> contiene l'identit√† specificata.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole" /> contains the specified identity; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole" /> contiene l'identit√† specificata, in caso contrario <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il nome di <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole" />.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the name of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole" />.
trans-unit.target: Stringa che contiene il nome dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole" />.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole.Name" /> was set to a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: La propriet√† <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole.Name" /> √® stata impostata su un riferimento null (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the role provider for the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il provider di ruoli per <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole" />.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the role provider for the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole" />.
trans-unit.target: Stringa che contiene il nome provider di ruoli per <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole" />.

trans-unit.source: The most commonly used role providers for <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole> are classes that inherit from <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider>.
trans-unit.target: I provider di ruoli pi√π comunemente usati per <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WebWorkflowRole> sono classi che ereditano da <xref:System.Web.Security.RoleProvider>.

trans-unit.source: These classes include <xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider>, <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider> and <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider>.
trans-unit.target: Tali classi includono <xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider>, <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlRoleProvider> e <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsTokenRoleProvider>.
